clearAllSettingsConfirm: This will clear all settings. Do you want to continue?
confirmDelete: Do you want to delete this item {{item}}?
encryptAndSaveToLocation: Encrypt with password and save to selected location
hintCtrlS: Hint: Use Ctrl + S hot heys to quicky save document changes
hintDisable: Hint: You can disable hints in settings
hintExportImport: Hint: Notes saved in browser can be exported / imported in settings
hintPassword: Hint: You can encrypt note with password - use password option when saving as ..
hintRowClick: Hint: Click row number to copy it to clipboard
hintRightClickList: Hint: Click with right button on list to open in new notepad
privThingIntroduction: PrivThings's data is saved to your browser's local storage (unless you save specifically to local file). Therefore it might be deleted when you delete your browsing history/cache or run disk cleaning application. You can use export / import options to backup / restore your data. Avoid using PrivThing with Incognito / Private window - your data will not be saved in those modes. Have a nice day.
providePasswordToOpenDecryptedFile: Provide password to open decrypted file
rollbackItemChanges: Rollback any changes to this item
startTypingToFilterFiles: Start typing to filter files (by title)
storageNotConfigured: Files storage folder and service not configured. You can only work with manual pick and save and localStorage files
question: Question
unsavedChanges: There are unsaved changes. Do you want to continue?
